name: Pennsylvania Coal & Coke Corporation v. Duncan-Spangler Coal Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Coal & Coke Corp. v. Duncan-Spangler Coal Co.

judges: Before Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Pennsylvania Coal & Coke Corporation v. Duncan-Spangler Coal Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Cunningham reported in 132 Pa. Superior Ct. 533.
Mr, Chief Justice Kephart and Mr. Justice Schaffer did not participate in the decision in this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Albert L. O’Connor, with him Edward Knuff and F. J. Hartmann, for appellant.
R. E. Farr, with him P. J. Little, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Pennsylvania Coal & Coke Corporation v. Duncan-Spangler Coal Company, Appellant.
Argued December 7, 1938.
Before Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Albert L. O’Connor, with him Edward Knuff and F. J. Hartmann, for appellant.
R. E. Farr, with him P. J. Little, for appellee.
January 9, 1939:
